channel.title: 2d3 Turbo - Signups [8/9]
channel.description:
## Welcome
### Timer
There will be a timer, posted when the game starts.
### Rules You must follow the https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244?u=thepigeonnyc You are expected to follow the https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926?u=thepigeonnyc One game-related post per day is required or you will be subbed out or modkilled
### Gameplay Days will be 5 minutes long, or shorter if hammered by majority. Nights will be 4 minutes long <small>or longer because I'm slow.</small> The Mafia have an optional factional kill that may be used with other actions.
### Cuddles To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" or "**/cuddle [player]**" *and* ping me Cuddles are plurality (person with most votes gets cuddled) and majority (if majority vote someone, day ends and that person is cuddled)
## Roles **Town**
> # [color="green"]Town Vanilla[/color] > > > > You have no special abilities. > > > > *Defeat all threats to the Town.*
> # [color="green"] Town Cop [/color] > > > > Every night you may choose to target someone to learn their alignment. > > > > *Defeat all threats to the Town.*
> # [color="green"] Town Doctor [/color] > > > > Every night you may choose to target someone except yourself to protect them from nightkills. > > > > *Defeat all threats to the Town.*
> # [color="green"]Town Tracker[/color] > > > > Every night you may choose to target someone to learn who they visited. > > > > *Defeat all threats to the Town.*
> # [color="green"] Town Friendly Neighbor [/color] > > > > Every night you may choose to target someone to learn you are the Town Friendly Neighbor. > > > > *Defeat all threats to the Town.*
> # [color="green"] Town Jailkeeper [/color] > > > > Every night you may choose to target someone to roleblock them and protect them from nightkills. > > > > *Defeat all threats to the Town.*
> # [color="green"] Town Mason [/color] > > > > Your mason partner is [mason partner]. You have a private chat with them at all times. > > > > *Defeat all threats to the Town.*
**Mafia**
> # [color="red"] Mafia Goon [/color] > > > > Your mafia partner is [mafia partner]. You have a private chat with them at all times. > > > > *Defeat or gain parity over the Town.*
> # [color="red"] Mafia Roleblocker [/color] > > > > Your mafia partner is [mafia partner]. You have a private chat with them at all times. > Every night you may choose to target someone to roleblock them. > > > > *Defeat or gain parity over the Town.*
> # [color="red"] Mafia Rolecop [/color] > > > > Your mafia partner is [mafia partner]. You have a private chat with them at all times. > Every night you may choose to target someone to learn their role. > > > > *Defeat or gain parity over the Town.*
### After The Night You will be told at least one of the following: > You slept peacefully Your target's alignment is [alignment] Your target visited [player]/Your target did not visit anyone [player] is the Friendy Neighbor! You were roleblocked last night! (You only get this feedback if you otherwise would have received non-sleeping non-friendly neighbor feedback) Your target is a Town [role]!
### Logs Message me your entire logbook, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Setup One row and one column is randomly selected.
![image](upload://rrTw150C36XtMnf4B856g9pURy2)
* **A1** : Mafia Goon, Mafia Roleblocker vs. Town Cop, Town Doctor, 5x Town Vanilla * **A2** : Mafia Goon, Mafia Roleblocker vs. Town Jailkeeper, Town Tracker, 5x Town Vanilla * **A3** : Mafia Goon, Mafia Roleblocker vs. Town Mason, Town Mason, 5x Town Vanilla * **B1** : Mafia Goon, Mafia Rolecop vs. Town Tracker, Town Friendly Neighbor, 5x Town Vanilla * **B2** : Mafia Goon, Mafia Rolecop vs. Town Jailkeeper, Town Friendly Neighbor, 5x Town Vanilla * **B3** : Mafia Goon, Mafia Rolecop vs. Town Tracker, Town Doctor, 5x Town Vanilla * **C1** : Mafia Goon, Mafia Goon vs. Town Cop, 6x Town Vanilla * **C2** : Mafia Goon, Mafia Goon vs. Town Jailkeeper, 6x Town Vanilla * **C3** : Mafia Goon, Mafia Goon vs. Town Mason, Town Mason, 5x Town Vanilla
Players: 1. eevee - Alive 2. Leafia - Alive 4. Thunal33 - Alive 5. Magnus - Alive 6. WindwardAway - Alive 8. GGhana - Alive 9. Intensify - Alive 10. TripleHaven - Alive
